question:
Which of the following statement is/are correct regarding the objectives of the National Wetlands Conservation Programme?
1) To lay down policy guidelines for the conservation and management of wetlands.
2) To provide financial assistance for undertaking intensive conservation measures in the identified wetlands.
3) To prepare an inventory of Indian wetlands.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
National Wetlands Conservation Programme was implemented in the year 1985-86. some of the objectives are:
1) To lay down policy guidelines for the conservation and management of wetlands.
2) To provide financial assistance for undertaking intensive conservation measures in the identified wetlands.
3) To prepare an inventory of Indian wetlands.
